title: Algebra
description: Sharpen your algebraic skills by solving equations, inequalities, and word problems that challenge your understanding of expressions and operations.

title: Geometry and Trigonometry
description: Explore the properties of shapes, angles, and trigonometric functions. Develop spatial reasoning and problem-solving techniques.

title: Problem Solving and Data Analysis
description: Master real-world applications of mathematics, including data interpretation, probability, and quantitative reasoning for statistical analysis.

title: Advanced Math
description: Tackle complex mathematical concepts, including quadratic equations, exponential functions, and rational expressions, to develop higher-order problem-solving skills.
